Cyc DTDs

Some Cyc results and output are available as XML. This collection of DTDs describe the most commonly-used Cyc XML outputs.

The schemaLocation attributes for the DTDs in this directory assume that other Cyc DTDs are available under http://dev.cyc.com/dtd/
